mapper.sql: SELECT p.INTIME,p.MERID,m.MERNAME,e.OPERATOR FROM (SELECT MERID,MIN(INTIME) INTIME from UMPAY.T_PROXYGOODS_INF group by MERID) p INNER JOIN UMPAY.T_MER_INF m on m.MERID=p.MERID LEFT JOIN UMPAY.T_HFMER_EXP e on e.MERID=p.MERID WHERE 1=1 #if( $merId && $merId!='' ) AND p.MERID=:merId #end #if( $merName && $merName!='' ) AND m.MERNAME like '%$merName%' #end #if( $operator && $operator!='' ) AND e.OPERATOR=:operator #end ORDER BY p.INTIME DESC
